short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your WhatsApp privacy on WhatsApp Web and start chats directly by entering mobile numbers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you often find yourself in situations where prying eyes are a concern while using WhatsApp Web? Whether it's at work, in public places, or even at home, maintaining privacy is crucial. "WhatsApp ChatShield And Quick Chat" is the perfect solution for those who value their privacy and want to keep their WhatsApp messages  and media hide and safe from unwanted attention.

Key Features:
Quick Chat: Send WhatsApp messages without saving the mobile no on WhatsApp web. 
Secure and Private: All processing is done locally on your device, ensuring that your messages and media remain confidential and are not sent to any external servers.
Automatic Message Blurring: Instantly blur incoming and existing messages, ensuring that only you can read them.
Media Concealment: Automatically hide images, videos, and GIFs until you choose to reveal them. No more worrying about inappropriate or personal media popping up unexpectedly.
Customizable Settings: Configure which types of content to blur â€“ messages, images, videos, or all media.
Quick Enable/Disable: Easily enable or disable the extension with a single click, allowing you to switch privacy modes on the fly.
